Package research.readjson

Class Read

  • java.lang.Object
    • research.readjson.Read
  • public class Read
extends java.lang.Object
    Takes a JSON file and converts it to Java data structures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Read​(java.lang.String url_string)
      Constructor: creates an instance of Read class with an input JSON file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int arraySize()
      Returns the size of the input JSON array, or 0 if the given JSON file is not a JSON array but a single JSON object.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> getJsonList()
      Returns the given JSON file as an ArrayList, when the given JSON element is a JSON array
      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getJsonMap()
      Returns the given JSON file as a LinkedHashMap, when the given JSON element is a single JSON object or a JSON array of length one.
      java.lang.String getJsonString()
      Returns the given JSON file as a String.
      void toJsonElement()
      Execute the conversion of the JSON file into Java data structures.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Read

        public Read​(java.lang.String url_string)
        Constructor: creates an instance of Read class with an input JSON file. The JSON file given as its url address then gets saved as a Java String.
        Parameters:
        url_string - the url address of the json file.

    • Method Detail

      • getJsonString

        public java.lang.String getJsonString()
        Returns the given JSON file as a String.
        Returns:
        a String form of the JSON file.

      • getJsonList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> getJsonList()
        Returns the given JSON file as an ArrayList, when the given JSON element is a JSON array
        Returns:
        an ArrayList form of the JSON array.

      • getJsonMap

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getJsonMap()
        Returns the given JSON file as a LinkedHashMap, when the given JSON element is a single JSON object or a JSON array of length one.
        Returns:
        a LinkedHashMap form of the JSON object.

      • toJsonElement

        public void toJsonElement()
        Execute the conversion of the JSON file into Java data structures.

      • arraySize

        public int arraySize()
        Returns the size of the input JSON array, or 0 if the given JSON file is not a JSON array but a single JSON object.
        Returns:
        the size of the input JSON array.
